@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm i walked away half an hour ago. As i stated. This parley is over.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm Then this parley is over.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm urgh. this is now circular reasoning. If you arent going to provide evidence on your conclusion...
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm you have hit your third logical fallacy. Onus Probandi.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm It is then for me to address and counter with supporting evidence.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm The corner stone of an argument, is express a point of view and offer supporting evidence.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm I read the text. I saw nothing supporting your "satanic child sacrificers"
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm the burden of proof is on you. You raised this point- where is your thesis.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm no, i speed read both of them.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm you have prooved nothing or provided no evidence. Argument ad ignoratium.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm to get across. your line of discussion has been disjointed
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm nor do they even come close to a body of proof, evidence, at all. Hell i dont even know what you are trying
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm you have given two speeches as "Evidence" and asked three questions. None of which lead anywhere.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm They are simply the empty rhetoric repeated through history. What of them.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm Another wild assumption and/or accusation.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm So. Wild claims, no substantiation. A false equivalence argument is not valid. Its a logical fallacy.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm you are making some wild assumptions there mate. " Hear all, question everything".
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm well you have offered no link. no book. no evidence. Opinion =/= fact is fallacious.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm The world was small millenia.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm Basic genetics. I am related to King Brian Boru, King wenceslas and the Le Breton Family.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm and down the rabbit hole we go... #TinFoilHatZone
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm My knowledge is great in history. Yet to see the "satanist cult" link.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm The winner colours history. History is revised by historians, revisionists and correctionists.
@wallabemu7_62 @DavidLeyonhjelm sure. i will hear all, trust nothing.
